TopicTitle: How many hours of playtime do you have in KSP?

Articles.Content: I personally have 410.4 hours.
more than 2000
1000 and counting.
more then 4000.

86.4 on PC
2365 hours on console

139 on console 

400+ on pc
Uh. I used to do it all the time on Steam and racked up 1200 hours+, but then I found out Steam steals some of the RAM that KSP needs, so I started using the shortcuts, and I have no idea now.
Over 3000 hours.
yikes im getting flexed on
600+ maybe? I bought the version from the website, not the steam that has a playtime counter.
Over 600 on GOG, over 200 on steam (and counting) and lords know how much outside of any launchers. I'd say well over a thousand.
Errrmmm.   Around 4000 to 5000 at a guess, in over 8 years.  Don't have any record though (which is probably just as well) so it could easily be more.

1100 hours on Steam here! Admittedly most of that time was not spent actually playing the game, but instead rendering, debugging, waiting for the darn thing to load, and accidentally leaving it on in the background accumulating who knows how many extra hours... If there has been one thing I've learned from the time I've actually spent playing though...

Mods are life.

According to Steam, I currently have 4.6 hours of playtime.  Since 2013.

I skimmed the forums before I bought it, so I knew to make a copy of the game elsewhere on my comp and play that copy, so that updates wouldn't screw up my game.  Of course, doing that means Steam can't keep track of my hours, so... maybe 2500-3000 hours?
Couple hundred? I got it in December so IDK.

Depends on who you ask.

(Hint: I've played more than 11 hours)

According to Steam, 1791 hours so far.

But at the beginning I had an even weaker computer so I used to close Steam and start KSP directly to save some MB of RAM.

So, maybe a few hundred hours more...
Steam tells me I’ve got 91 hours, but it also tells me I bought the game in 2015 so I have my doubts about that number. I mostly use the desktop shortcut so I’ve probably got 300+.
I have 987.2 hours on this computer.
1800 on Steam, but I rarely play on Steam,  Prolly closer to 10,000+ since 2014.  Played it exclusively 2014-2018 (and was on the experimentals team).

over 3300 on steam, and probably around 1000 more on non steam shortcuts... since late 2018
i have REALLY slowed down playing ksp lol...

11 minutes ago, JcoolTheShipbuilder said:

since late 2018
i have REALLY slowed down playing ksp lol...

Me too. I wonder why?
180 counted on steam, more if you include non-steam installs for more modded stuff
